text: Hima ngei murdi hih nin lei riet sai nikhomsenla, nangni min riet nôk ku nuom Pumapa'n 1:5: Pumapa'n; senkhat ngei miziek chu Jisua, tin an dônna Greek chongin Joshua tina leh munkhat ani. Isrealngei ha Egypt ram renga a kêlsuo ngeia, aniatachu a iemloi pungei chu nûka ala minmang ngei nôk ani.
